Title: Be ready at all times to wipe out any invader
Designer: Qin Tianjian (秦天健)Xie Linghu (谢令虎)Xi'an Red Flag State Machine Factory military propaganda group, revolutionary committee (西安国营红旗机械厂军宣队革命委员会)
Publisher: Shaanxi renmin chubanshe (陕西人民出版社), Xi'an
Notes: The scene in the background represents resistance against the Japanese occupation.
